title.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU 3) Basic Course, Nigeria

description.narrative: Special Investigative Unit (SIU 3) Basic Course, Nigeria; This is a five week course serves as the foundation in fundamental law enforcement practices for newly assigned officers. It is based on the DEA Basic Agent training program and covers a wide range of topics in drug law enforcement.
